showImportDialog.name: Show Import Dialog
showImportDialog.hint: Show the import dialog when loading a world. Disable this if you don't want to be prompted.

import.title: Import Harbinger House Content
import.description: This module contains PF2e-converted NPCs, items, and hazards from the Harbinger House adventure. Select what you'd like to import below.

import.partial: Imported {imported} NPCs, but {failed} failed. Check console for details.
